content: bandana headband designer wendy van leeuwen @mycrochetteacher step-by-step tutorial video at https //www youtube com/watch v=6w0quxs8szu&t=41s questions mycrochetteacher@gmail com difficulty level 2 intermediate yarn 50 grams #4 weight cotton yarn 4 mm crochet hook size measures approximately 16 side to side without ties and 11 front to back abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es slip_stitch - slip_stitch skip - skip double_crochet - double_crochet decrease -double_crochet two together repeat - repeat space - space instructions chain 63 row 1 ws work single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook and in each chat to end turn row 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet into next single_crochet *chain 1 skip 1 st double_crochet into next 2 sts repeat from * to the end turn row 3 chain 5 counts as double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet into the next chain space *chain 4 single_crochet into next chain space repeat from * to last 2 sts chain 2 double_crochet into 3rd chain of starting chain turn row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st double_crochet *work 5 double_crochet into next chain-4 space single_crochet into next chain-4 space repeat from * to end placing last single_crochet into 3rd chain of the starting chain fasten_off keeping it rs facing turn work 180 degrees to work on the opposite edge row 1 rs join yarn to the right hand edge work 62 single_crochet across the foundation chain opposite the single_crochet from the first row worked turn row 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet into next single_crochet *chain 1 skip 1 st double_crochet into next 2 sts repeat from * to the last 4 sts chain 1 skip 1 st decrease turn row 3 chain 3 skip double_crochet and chain-1 space double_crochet in the next double_crochet *chain 1 double_crochet in the next chain-1 space and in the double_crochet following repeat from * across to the last 4 sts double_crochet in the last double_crochet from the row below ignore the chain-3 starting chain turn row 4 chain 3 skip next st *double_crochet in the next st and in the chain-1 space chain 1 skip 1 repeat from * to the last 4 sts double_crochet in the next st and the chain-1 space double_crochet in the last st the top of the turning chain from the row below turn there are 18 pairs of double_crochet across plus one double_crochet at each end row 5 chain 3 skip the next 2 sts *double_crochet in the chain-1 space and the following double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 repeat from * until 17 pairs of double_crochet are worked don t work a chain 1 after the last pair double_crochet in the last st turn row 6 chain 3 skip next st *double_crochet in the next st the second double_crochet in the pair below and in the chain-1 space chain 1 skip 1 repeat from * across until 16 pairs of double_crochet are worked don t work a chain 1 after the last pair double_crochet in the last st turn row
